### SOURCE 1 URL: https://www.bendingspoons.com/ # We _acquire_ and _improve_ iconic products ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FHarvest-card.69130bba.webp&w=3840&q=75) 1+billionregistered users 400+millionmonthly active users 10+millionmonthly paying customers S i n c e 2 0 1 4 , w e ’ v e b e e n a c q u i r i n g d i g i t a l p r o d u c t s . N o t t o s e l l o n , b u t t o o w n a n d o p e r a t e f o r t h e l o n g t e r m . T h e t r a n s f o r m a t i o n s w e m a k e a r e o f t e n d e e p — d e s i g n e d t o s p e e d u p i n n o v a t i o n , b e n e f i t c u s t o m e r s , a n d s t r e n g t h e n b u s i n e s s p e r f o r m a n c e . H e r e , h i e r a r c h y i s m i n i m a l a n d t e a m s a r e s m a l l a n d t a l e n t - d e n s e . W e o p e r a t e e s t a b l i s h e d p r o d u c t s w i t h t h e a m b i t i o n , a g i l i t y , a n d u r g e n c y o f a s t a r t u p . ## Products ### Vimeo ![Vimeo logo](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Vimeo_logo.eeb3f05a.svg) Acquired November 2025 - Working on initial improvements ![Vimeo card](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fvimeo_card.f1b91b66.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Evernote ![Evernote logo](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Evernote_logo.cf3a7a9d.svg) Acquired January 2023 - Released 200+ features and improvements - Increased sync speed by up to 3x across devices ![Evernote card](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fevernote_card.0cdcb6a3.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Remini ![Remini logo](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Remini_logo.cd96e6b6.svg) Acquired June 2021 - Grew monthly active users more than 5x - Tested, productized, and scaled 100+ AI models ![Remini card](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fremini_card.e329c632.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### WeTransfer ![WeTransfer logo](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/WeTransfer_logo.4c536ad8.svg) Acquired July 2024 - Recovered 3+ million expired transfers with new feature - 100+ user-time years saved through reduced upload times ![WeTransfer card](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fwetransfer_card.09bea7a3.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Harvest ![Harvest logo](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Harvest_logo.cd7fc3b9.svg) Acquired July 2025 - Working on initial improvements ![Harvest card](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fharvest_card.eaf481b1.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Meetup ![Meetup logo](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Meetup_logo.c631c7e1.svg) Acquired February 2024 - Refreshed brand, redesigned apps - Introduced free plan for organizers (first time since 2005) ![Meetup card](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmeetup_card.76a4161f.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Komoot ![Komoot logo](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Komoot_logo.81318769.svg) Acquired March 2025 - Released 80+ improvements and new features - Developed best-in-class Apple Watch app ![Komoot card](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fkomoot_card.0b7d069e.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### AOL ![AOL logo](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/AOL_logo.18f5c2a3.svg) Acquired January 2026 - Working on initial improvements ![AOL card](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Faol_card.52c77ee1.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### StreamYard ![StreamYard logo](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/stream-yard_logo.131a7622.svg) Acquired April 2024 - Released 50+ improvements and new features - Introduced 4K local recordings and AI editing ![StreamYard card](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fstreamyard_card.e584c582.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Brightcove ![Brightcove logo](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Brightcove_logo.b216dcf9.svg) Acquired February 2025 - Delivered AI Suite, Live 4K, SSAI with DRM, vertical video - Reached all-time high customer satisfaction score: 4.91/5 ![Brightcove card](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbrightcove_card.af65dd22.webp&w=3840&q=75) ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Splice_logo.7d9f9dc2.svg) ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Harvest_logo.cd7fc3b9.svg) ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/MileIQ_logo.05a13913.svg) ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Issuu_logo.6de70555.svg) ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Filmic_logo.6916125c.svg) ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/robokiller_logo.302028d6.svg) ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/static/media/Loomly_logo.83f8279b.svg) ## Proprietary technologies ![An abstract illustration of Minerva](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FMinerva.08b3230b.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Minerva User lifetime value predictions ![An abstract illustration of Juno](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FJuno.e89e0784.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Juno Multi-channel payment management ![An abstract illustration of Xina](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FXina.7ca686d3.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Xina High-accuracy marketing attribution ![An abstract illustration of Galf](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FGalf.a9caceed.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Galf Multi-asset secure access control ![An abstract illustration of Matrix](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmatrix.75d05777.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Matrix Propagation of validated UX patterns ![An abstract illustration of Pico](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FPico.81ffea2f.webp&w=3840&q=75) ### Pico High-throughput data ingestion ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FLumen.9e106bd7.webp&w=640&q=75) Lumen ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FAbacus.79f7ed1d.webp&w=640&q=75) Abacus ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FPeterbot.9c9940fb.webp&w=640&q=75) Janus ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FOrion.0562cd66.png&w=640&q=75) Orion ![](https://www.bendingspoons.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Frolemodel.27e9a064.png&w=640&q=75) ### SOURCE 2 URL: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons [Jump to content](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#bodyContent) From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Italian technology company For the act of spoon bending, see [spoon bending](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spoon_bending "Spoon bending"). | [![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/74/Bending_Spoons_Logo_with_Wordmark.svg/250px-Bending_Spoons_Logo_with_Wordmark.svg.png)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Bending_Spoons_Logo_with_Wordmark.svg) | | Company type | [Private](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Privately_held_company "Privately held company") | | Founded | 2013; 13 years ago (2013) in [Copenhagen](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copenhagen "Copenhagen"), Denmark[\[1\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-1) | | Founders | - Luca Ferrari
- Francesco Patarnello
- Matteo Danieli
- Luca Querella
- Tomasz Greber | | Headquarters | [Milan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milan "Milan"), Italy | | Products | - [AOL](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AOL "AOL")
- [Brightcove](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brightcove "Brightcove")
- [Eventbrite](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eventbrite "Eventbrite")
- [Evernote](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Evernote "Evernote")
- [Harvest](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harvest_(software) "Harvest (software)")
- [Issuu](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Issuu "Issuu")
- [Komoot](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Komoot "Komoot")
- [Meetup](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meetup "Meetup")
- [MileIQ](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MileIQ "MileIQ")
- [Remini](https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Remini_(aplicaci%C3%B3n)&action=edit&redlink=1 "Remini (aplicación) (page does not exist)") \[ [es](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Remini_(aplicaci%C3%B3n) "es:Remini (aplicación)")\]
- [StreamYard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/StreamYard "StreamYard")
- [Vimeo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vimeo "Vimeo")
- [WeTransfer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WeTransfer "WeTransfer") | | Number of employees | 1,000 (2025)[\[2\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-2) | | [Subsidiaries](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Subsidiary "Subsidiary") | - [Evernote Corporation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Evernote_Corporation "Evernote Corporation")
- [Brightcove](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brightcove "Brightcove") | | Website | [bendingspoons.com](https://bendingspoons.com/) | Bending Spoons S.p.A. **Bending Spoons S.p.A.** is an Italian [technology](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Technology_company "Technology company") [conglomerate](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conglomerate_(company) "Conglomerate (company)") founded in 2013. Based in [Milan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milan "Milan"), the company typically acquires products with existing product‑market fit[\[3\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-3) and manages them for long-term ownership.[\[4\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-5) ## History \[ [edit](https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Bending_Spoons&action=edit§ion=1 "Edit section: History")\] Luca Ferrari, Francesco Patarnello, and Matteo Danieli, worked on an unsuccessful venture-funded product startup called Evertale. They were left with $40,000, which became the seed capital for Bending Spoons in June 2013, also founded in Copenhagen.[\[6\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-forbes2025a-6)[\[7\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-7)[\[8\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-larep2024a-8) The company name was inspired by a scene from the science fiction movie _[The Matrix](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Matrix "The Matrix")_.[\[6\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-forbes2025a-6)[\[9\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-9) The company moved to Milan in 2014.[\[8\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-larep2024a-8) ## Immuni \[ [edit](https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Bending_Spoons&action=edit§ion=2 "Edit section: Immuni")\] On 17 April 2020, the [Italian government](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Government_of_Italy "Government of Italy") released a statement on its website announcing that Bending Spoons had been selected to design and develop Italy's official [COVID-19 contact tracing app](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/COVID-19_apps "COVID-19 apps"), [Immuni](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Immuni "Immuni").[\[10\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-10)[\[11\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-11) The app was released on 1 June 2020.[\[12\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-12) It was initially released in four [regions](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Regions_of_Italy "Regions of Italy"), then countrywide.[\[13\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-13) The app did not receive significant adoption and successfully tracked less than 1% of the total confirmed positive cases reported during the period it was active.[\[14\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-14) The most commonly cited reasons for not using the app were the lack of perceived effectiveness and major technical issues.[\[15\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-15) Immuni was decommissioned on December 31, 2022.[\[16\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-16) ## Acquisitions \[ [edit](https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Bending_Spoons&action=edit§ion=3 "Edit section: Acquisitions")\] In September 2022, Bending Spoons acquired FiLMiC[\[17\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-17) and converted its video-recording app FiLMiC Pro to a subscription revenue model.[\[18\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-18) In December 2023, the original FiLMiC team were laid off, and development of FiLMiC Pro was continued in-house by Bending Spoons.[\[19\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-19) In November 2022, Bending Spoons agreed to acquire [Evernote](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Evernote "Evernote").[\[20\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-20) The acquisition was concluded in January 2023.[\[21\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-21) In July 2023, Evernote laid off all of its existing staff and announced it would relocate to Europe to be closer to Bending Spoons' headquarters.[\[22\]](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bending_Spoons#cite_note-22) Bending Spoons made a series of acquisitions in 2024. In January, it acquired the assets of New York City-based mobile app developer Mosaic Group from [IAC Inc.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IAC_Inc. "IAC Inc."); subsequently, Mosaic's entire workforce of 330 staff members was laid off, as they were not part of the acquisition.[\ ### SOURCE 3 URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Bending+Spoons&hl=en_US [![Screenshot image](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/nDyUSvCqcxQ/hqdefault.jpg)\\ \\ ![Thumbnail image](https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/XJ6_UDSJx-QHQreBmIro5VMRJ--42F1XY3QphSYkeSRZdAUA0o_Y-EydVdK-NZOh=s64-rw)\\ \\ Remini - AI Photo Enhancer\\ \\ Bending Spoons\\ \\ 4.1_star_](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bigwinepot.nwdn.international) [![Screenshot image](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qxa4vI8HYjI/hqdefault.jpg)\\ \\ ![Thumbnail image](https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/ybT8_draQp0QR0j1eqszcnlV522Wd3bzHwdIkO8ZDsdb8f4mU3ygfviSRGMdRd7H4bY=s64-rw)\\ \\ Splice - Video Editor & Maker\\ \\ Bending Spoons\\ \\ 3.7_star_](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.splice.video.editor) [![Screenshot image](https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/cTRkfjGEK2SPA-v7XcAxK5_VLMA-mbcRWkbSXUfmwopm7BIdpYVSMXVT25wBZl4X-g=w416-h235-rw)\\ \\ ![Thumbnail image](https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/RbJPza4n97TCYEO48P-gqrgQWzwv2sySmuk3vMT2nisX1ugJfDn6wRr2rr7gdDDgROw=s64-rw)\\ \\ Filmic Pro: Mobile Cine Camera\\ \\ Bending Spoons\\ \\ 2.4_star_](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.filmic.filmicpro) [![Screenshot image](https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/FxbuWJ0fvEYoUpPuucPakTsHmF6sa0uCdeaf_vpVd62RchLgz_F0ewc9Y6HWHadhNnI=w416-h235-rw)\\ \\ ![Thumbnail image](https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/hLpZrN4d307griTHhB9CcqleSXcDcUpGdQFcZ5xjpUUg1rgIOgNkhwDFsbzYIoCVR9Rw=s64-rw)\\ \\ Filmic Legacy\\ \\ Bending Spoons\\ \\ 1.7_star_](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.filmic.filmicpro.legacy) reCAPTCHA Recaptcha requires verification.
